product_name: Esbit Vacuum Flask - 34 fl. oz. - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The Esbit Vacuum Flask keeps your beverage hot for hours! It's a great choice when on the go. Stainless-steel construction is super durable; double-wall design provides insulation to keep your morning java nice and hot. Includes 2 screw plugs, 1 with a push button, 1 without. Includes a drinking mug; lid also doubles as a mug. Overstock.
short_description: The Esbit Vacuum Flask keeps your beverage hot for hours! It's a great choice when on the go.
